name: I Dare You To Speedrun
description: A short game that is sure to make you rage. If you are a youtuber or content creator, feel free to squeeze some videos out of this. Link them in the comments if you do and i'll try to check em out when i get some free time. Follow my Itch account for updates on the game and I hope you enjoy playing it! And try and speedrun it...if you can -v-
